item.title: Migrate Citrix Policies from XenApp 6.5 to >7.6
item.description: Migrate Citrix Policies from XenApp 6.5 to >7.6 In this post I will outline the process I used to overcome the limitations of existing Citrix policy migrating tools. Per Citrix, there is no direct path to migrate policies from xenapp version 6.5 to 7.7 or above, you must first install and migrate to 7.6, then do an in-place upgrade to the desired version. (source: docs.citrix.com). Unfortunately, many discover this only after their brand new 7.
